title: Foxworth Friday: Devaluing The Heisman, Damian Lillard and Luka Doncic Issues
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss the diminishing importance of The Heisman Trophy in college football (1:10), as well as the situations in Portland and Dallas around star players Damian Lillard and Luka Doncic (18:21). Plus, why despite attaining the parity once thought to be desired, the NBA just can't catch on in the way the NFL does (33:41). 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
